response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its high value and significance to us, we're offering it to you at a special price considering its worth to you. We kindly propose a transaction at $13,500. This offer reflects a strategic midpoint between its intrinsic value and what you perceive its worth to be, aiming to satisfy both parties. We believe this price is fair and offers a significant advantage compared to other potential buyers. Let's make this deal happen and bring this valuable asset into your possession.", "product_price": 13500}
